steps.name: $("By.xpath: //div[@data-control-input='search']//input") send keys([Copy of John Smith, î€‡])
$("By.xpath: //a[contains(@href, 'documents') and text()='Copy of John Smith']") should be(enabled)
$("By.xpath: //a[contains(@href, 'documents') and text()='Copy of John Smith']") click()
$("By.xpath: //div[contains(@class,'MuiToolbar-root') and .//@title='Copy of John Smith']") should(be visible)
$("By.xpath: //div[contains(@class,'MuiToolbar-root') and .//@title='Copy of John Smith']") should be(visible)
